8571fc1fa0ed37543ab349075d4626a951e9269c.description: tells the bash shell to do nothing for 60 minutes, then to request the process labeled spotify to gracefully shut down.

1c73882808ce25b1333bf0f4b34ba5f94179a7f5.description: sends ping packets to google's IP address 4 times

ade8891466c48206771f3cb0dfc42306b257e1e2.description: lists all mounted filesystems, useful for when you are directly writing to a filesystem or flashing an external drive.

a5980b8b865e192469635c5665c90746cb9b01b6.command: sudo dd if=<file to be flashed> of=<storage to flash to, ex: /dev/sda> bs=1M status=progress
a5980b8b865e192469635c5665c90746cb9b01b6.description: writes a file, usually an OS image, directly to a storage medium. very dangerous, can soft brick your PC.
